body.p:
No 635.)
Louisville, Ky. March 10th 1862.
Mr Jas W. Tate
asst. Secretary
of State,
Dear Sir,

An invitation that you addressed to me last October, was mislaid amongst my papers, inviting me to renew application, for a new Commission from his Excellency, Governor McGoffin, I avail myself of the opportunity, and would be very much obliged to you, to present my application to his Excellency, for a renewal of the same; likewise, would be obliged to you to tell me how much, I must send if it is time enough yet for that application.

I remain Sir,
with much respect
most obedt Servt,,
J. J. Perrin
asst Vice consuul Fr

Hon Secretary of State
Frankfort, Ky,
